#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int compare_desc(const void *a, const void *b) {
    return *(int*)b - *(int*)a;
}

long long powmod(long long base, long long exp, long long mod) {
    long long result = 1;
    while (exp > 0) {
        if (exp % 2 == 1) {
            result = (result * base) % mod;
        }
        base = (base * base) % mod;
        exp /= 2;
    }
    return result;
}

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);

    // Read t array
    int *t = malloc((n + 1) * sizeof(int));
    t[0] = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &t[i]);
    }

    // Read a array
    int *a = malloc((n + 1) * sizeof(int));
    a[0] = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    }

    // Process first part
    int *cnt = calloc((n + 1), sizeof(int)); // Initialize to 0
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
        cnt[a[i]]++;
    }

    int *ans = malloc((n + 1) * sizeof(int));
    int ans_len = 0;

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (t[i] != 1) continue;

        int *crt = malloc((n + 1) * sizeof(int));
        int crt_len = 0;
        int x = i;
        crt[crt_len++] = x;
        x = a[x];
        while (cnt[x] == 1) {
            crt[crt_len++] = x;
            x = a[x];
        }

        if (crt_len > ans_len) {
            ans_len = crt_len;
            for (int j = 0; j < crt_len; j++) {
                ans[j] = crt[j];
            }
        }
        free(crt);
    }

    // Reverse ans array
    for (int j = 0; j < ans_len / 2; j++) {
        int temp = ans[j];
        ans[j] = ans[ans_len - 1 - j];
        ans[ans_len - 1 - j] = temp;
    }

    // Process second part
    int *c = malloc(ans_len * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < ans_len; i++) {
        c[i] = ans[i];
    }

    qsort(c, ans_len, sizeof(int), compare_desc);

    long long mod = 1000000007;
    long long exponent = 2 * ans_len - 2;
    long long b = powmod(2, exponent, mod);
    long long a_val = (2 * b) % mod;
    long long ans_second = 0;

    for (int i = 0; i < ans_len; i++) {
        long long temp = (a_val + (i * b)) % mod;
        temp = (temp * c[i]) % mod;
        ans_second = (ans_second + temp) % mod;
    }

    free(c);
    free(ans);
    free(cnt);
    free(a);
    free(t);

    // Process third part
    char str[20];
    sprintf(str, "%lld", ans_second);
    int hasA = 0, hasB = 0;
    for (int i = 0; str[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        if (str[i] == 'A') hasA = 1;
        if (str[i] == 'B') hasB = 1;
    }
    printf("%s\n", (hasA && hasB) ? "Yes" : "No");

    return 0;
}
